Introducing 100 Days of Code with C/C++

Welcome to the first day of 100 days of code. It is going to be a fun and exciting journey through programming with C and C++. Each day you will be given a tutorial and a program to code. You must complete coding the program and post it in the slack channel. Solutions will be posted both in the slack channel and on this blog the day after it is assigned.

Feel free to ask any question you would like. You can ping me on Slack and I can answer you there or we can do a Hangout or Slack meeting. Also feel free to post questions in the ‚Äògeneral‚Äô channel if you would like to ask questions to the group. That way any one could answer your questions as well.

Github

Github is a great online repository to save all of your work. Create an account via this link: Join Github If you have a github account, great! You are almost ready to begin! Follow this link on how to commit your first document to your repo.

As written before, all projects will be posted on both the blog and on Slack.
